form.privacy_policy_details: explains when and why we collect personal information about you, how we use it, how we keep it secure and your right to see or remove the data we hold about you.
form.privacy_policy_reach_us: If you have any questions or concerns about how we use your data please contact data@distrelec.com
form.com_preferences_message: We would like to keep you up-to-date with news, events, offers, new products, promotions, and catalogues. We may also send you personalised recommendations as well as feedback surveys to understand more about you and your experience with Distrelec.
form.com_preferences_by_email: I would like to receive communications by email
form.like_receiving_newsletters: I would like to receive following newsletters
form.you_need_to_opt_in_emails: Please note that you need to opt-in to "I would like to receive communications by email" before we are able to send you newsletters.
form.receive_coms_over_phone_sms: I would like to receive communication via phone / sms / post to hear / receive information about new brands, products, services and promotions.
form.like_receive_coms_by_sms: I would like to receive communications by SMS
form.like_receive_coms_by_phone: I would like to receive communications by phone
form.like_receive_coms_by_post: I would like to receive communications by post
form.to_opt_for_preference_visit: To opt-in for this preference, please visit
form.ensure_for_correct_contact_details: to ensure we have your correct contact details.
form.personalisation_suggestions: Based on your interactions with the web shop, sales, product and brand preferences, we would like to personalise your experience with Distrelec.
form.receive_personalized_coms_based_on_activ: I would like to receive personalised communications based on my account information, on-site activity and purchase history
form.match_profiling_data_with_third_parties_: We would like to match profiling data from third parties such as Google, LinkedIn, Facebook and other
form.help_us_select_contents_fits_your_intere: to help us select content that fits your interests that we will display in communications, on our websites and within third party and partner sites.
form.happy_for_distrelec_to_combine_my_data: I am happy for Distrelec to combine my data with data from it's partners to deliver an enhanced customer experience both on the web shop and on other websites

lc_popup_title.nl: SAME DAY – SAME DAY DELIVERY FOR OUR CORPORATE CUSTOMERS

lc_popup_content.ch:
This item can be delivered on the same day.

If you want this delivery option, please call our Customer Service at the following phone number:
044 944 99 11

You can find more information under the following link:
https://www.distrelec.ch/en/ordering/cms/ordering?marketingPopup=false
lc_popup_content.nl:
This delivery option is available for all items marked Same Day.

Order by 15.30 and receive the goods on the same day – possible at Distrelec Netherlands, thanks to our warehouse in ‘s-Hertogenbosch!

Delivery costs are calculated according to distance and weight.

Please contact our Customer Service Team on +31 30 2650150 for advice, a detailed calculation of delivery costs and confirmation of the desired delivery date.

form.quote.limit.message: Your daily quotation limit has been reached, this request has not been submitted. Please try and resubmit the quotation request tomorrow.
form.quote.resubmit.error.title: Quotation Request Failed
form.accept_terms_and_conditions: Yes, I have read and hereby accept the terms and conditions and the data protection terms.
